# unicodeScalars

**Instance Property**

The Unicode scalars of the discontiguous attributed string, as a view into the underlying string.

## Declaration

```swift
var unicodeScalars: DiscontiguousSlice<AttributedString.UnicodeScalarView> { get }
```
